网纹长颈鹿(Reticulated Giraffe):体型较小,身上的纹路较呈方型的网状。(下图)罗氏长颈鹿(Rothschild's Giraffe):跟网纹长颈鹿很像，.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French girafe, Italian giraffa, or Spanish and Portuguese girafa, based on Arabic zarāfa. The animal was known in Europe in the medieval period, and isolated instances of names for it based on the Arabic are recorded in Middle English, when it was commonly called the camelopard

encyclopedia.content: giraffe是一个英语单词，它是一个名词，它的意思有： 1、长颈鹿 2、鹿豹座 3、斜井提升矿车 4、地面翻锛埧箫級车装置 5、多层箕斗， 高空工作升降台 美国传统词典（双解） giraffe gi.raffe AHD:[j…-r²f“] D.J.[d9*6r#f] K.K.[d9*6r#f] n.（名词） 【复数】 gi.raffes 或 giraffe An African ruminant mammal(Giraffa camelopardalis) having a very long neck and legs, a tan coat with orange-brown to black blotch

entry.def: A giraffe is a large African animal with a very long neck, long legs, and dark patches on its body.

means.word_mean: 1. tallest living quadruped; having a spotted coat and small horns and very long neck and legs; of savannahs of tropical Africa
